attributes.action: Stop everyone stockpiling food in the hours of covid 19
attributes.additional_details: Covid 19 all the other countries have been put on lock down and there super markets are full, and everyone can get there essentials, there's no milk, bread, fruit, veg, meat, paracetamol, calpol, nappies, formula, and toilet rolls, and it's so sad to see the older generation crying in the shops when the can't get no food, they fought in ww2 for us, and they had more food then than what they did now, and all the workers trying to save the country on 12 hr shifts have no food
attributes.background: We're never going to survive if the stockpiling is not stop, in the supermarkets, action needs to be taken now, to save our oaps and all the workers, that are doing 12hr shifts who are trying to keep the UK going, why can't you enforce a limit on how many enter the shops and essentials should one
